cq.a: David was the seventh son of Jesse. [2:13-14]
cq.q: Who was the seventh son of Jesse?

cq.a: Yes, God granted him his prayer. [4:10]
He prayed that God would bless him, extend his territory, keep him from harm so that he might not have to endure pain. [4:9-10]
cq.q: What did Jabez pray to the God of Israel?

cq.a: They were seeking pasture for their flocks, and they found abundant and good pasture there. [4:39-40]
cq.q: Why did some of the sons of Shimei go to Gedor on the east side of the valley?
